Aurora.Route 59 station:
Route 59 Station is a Metra station along the BNSF Railway Line on the border of Aurora, Illinois and Naperville, Illinois. The station is named for and on Illinois Route 59 to distinguish itself from Naperville Metra Station to the east and Aurora Transportation Center to the west.
The tracks that service the station run east and west and form the border between Aurora and Naperville in this area.
